resources.string: Mycelium suporta Contas HD e Contas de Endereço Único. Todas Contas HD criadas são baseadas na mesma Semente Mestre.
Para adicionar uma conta de Endereço Único baseada em uma chave privada ou em um endereço somente-leitura, por favor clique no botão Avançado abaixo.
Escanear endereço Bitcoin, chave privada ou Conta-HD.
Escanear a Semente Mestre de um Backup Mycelium
Você só pode ter uma Conta HD não-utilizada.
Importar da área de transferência endereço Bitcoin ou chave privada.
Criar Semente Mestre a partir de Lista de Palavras
Fundos insuficientes para pagar a taxa
A quantia que você está enviando é muito pequeuna
Erro ao transmitir a transação.\nVocê gostaria de colocar a transação em espera, de maneira que ela seja enviada automaticamente quando você ficar online?
Copiar para a área de transferência
Copiar Chave Privada para a Área de Transferência
Copiado para a área de transferência
Essa página mostra seu histórico de transações.\n\nNão há nenhuma transação para exibir.
Essa página mostra seu livro de endereços.\n\nO seu livro de endereços está vazio.
Definir um código PIN que restringe o acesso para envio de moedas, exportação de chaves privadas e modificação do código PIN
Selecione a moeda local do seu país
Selecione a fonte para obter as taxas de corretagem entre Bitcoin e moedas fiduciárias
Definir denominação Bitcoin preferida. BTC, mBTC, or μBTC
Comunicar através de firewalls restritivos ou usando Tor com Orbot. Insira um nome de host e porta, ex: \'localhost:9050\'
Você não pode definir um PIN antes de fazer um backup da sua semente mestre.
Os dois códigos PIN não conferem
Você tem certeza que quer apagar esse endereço de seu livro de endereços?

Você está prestes a exportar dados sensíveis da conta selecionada.

Qualquer um que obtiver acesso a essas chaves poderá tomar posse dos bitcoins ou obter informações que podem comprometer sua privacidade.

Você quer continuar?

Você deveria fazer um backup da semente mestre de sua carteira.
Uma backup da semente mestre permite que você restaure os fundos armazenado nas suas contas HD caso o seu dispositivo seja perdido ou parar de funcionar.

Você quer fazer isso agora?

Você irá fazer backup das contas de endereço único de sua carteira. 
Esse backup não irá conter sua semente mestre, nenhuma das suas contas HD poderá ser restaurada a partir dele!

Você quer continuar?

Aviso: Exportar os dados privados da conta para a sua área de transferência os expõe para todos os outros aplicativos do seu dispositivo.

Nota: Não é suficiente armazenar seus dados privados na área de transferência, você também precisa colar esses dados em algum lugar seguro.

Você quer continuar?
Chave Privada Encontrada na Área de Transferência
A área de transferência contém uma chave privada.\r\nVocê quer limpar a área de transferência?
Taxa de corretagem não disponível para %1$s
Nota: Você está enviando para um de seus próprios endereços.
Aviso: A sua carteira não tem a chave privada para esse endereço.\nVocê não pode gastar os bitcoins recebidos, a menos que você tenha a chave privada anota em outro lugar.
Adquirir endereço Bitcoin da área de transferência.

Você está prestes a gastar a partir da chave privada do armazenamento frio. Ela pode ser uma chave privada em um backup de papel ou em um caixa eletrônico de Bitcoin. Os seguintes formatos são suportados:
Chave Privada, Semente Mestre, xPriv Key

Assim que a transação for enviada, todos os históricos dela serão apagados da memória interna.
Somenta apagar a chave privada e manter o endereço como uma conta somente-leitura

Archived accounts are not monitored, you can not see the balance and receiving address and not work with the account at all.

Archived accounts can be activated again.

Do you want to archive this account?
Do you want to restore a backup, or create a new wallet?
Você precisa manter pelo menos uma conta ativa.
The address book has another address with that name
The name is already in use for another account
Toque no código QR para melhorar escaneamento
Your network connection seems to be slow.\nWith a little patience we might get there…
The transaction was rejected by the network. This indicates that your wallet is out of sync
Redirecionando para um navegador de blocos
Usando endereço da área de transferência

This cannot be undone!

Current address:
%1$s

It contains %2$s

Do you want to delete it?

This cannot be undone!

Account label:
%1$s

Current address:
%2$s

It contains %3$s

Do you want to delete it?

This cannot be undone!

%1$s

Do you want to delete it?

This cannot be undone!

Account label:
%1$s

Current address:
%2$s

Do you want to delete it?

Having a proper backup is a cornerstone when managing your Bitcoin funds.\n\nBy verifying your backup you make sure that your backup works and that you do not lose your funds if your Android device is lost or damaged.
Verify your backup by scanning the private key or master seed QR code.\nSeveral formats are accepted, including the Mycelium encrypted paper backup.
Verify private key backup by taking the private key from the clipboard.
You have %1$s keys that have never been verified.
You have 1 key that has never been verified.
Your master seed has not been verified.
The private key does not match any of your Bitcoin addresses.
Private key backup successfully verified for the following address:\n\n%1$s
A semente escaneada não corresponde a sua semente mestre.

Having a proper backup is a cornerstone when managing your Bitcoin funds.
You have one or more Bitcoin private keys or a master seed where the backup has not been verified.

Please select the Backup option to make a back up.
Then select the Verify Backup option and verify your backup.

You are about to back up your encrypted private keys to a PDF document.\nThe PDF document can safely be shared using email or with file-sharing apps you have installed, such as Dropbox. This is because your keys are encrypted.
This is the random password with checksum used for encrypting this backup.
This is your only opportunity for viewing the password for this backup.\nYour next backup will use a different password.\nWrite it down and keep it safe!

Your Mycelium wallet backup is attached.

Follow these simple steps to secure your funds:
1. Print the PDF document.
2. Write the 15-character password from the display of your Android device to the blue boxes of the printout.
3. Verify that you can import the private keys to your Mycelium Wallet.
4. Store the printout in a safe place.
You are about to decrypt a password protected private key.
Enter the 15 character password and checksum.
The checksum is invalid. Please verify.
ERROR: Your device does not have enough memory to complete this task

Your wallet has one or more legacy accounts with funds.

To make sure that your funds are safe and to improve your anonymity you should move those funds to one of your HD accounts.

Please go to the Accounts tab for details.
Do you want to ignore warnings explaining that this legacy account holds funds?
Esse app é fornecido gratuitamente para você por
A senha que você digitou é inválida.\nGostaria de tentar novamente?
You are about to decrypt a BIP38 password protected private key.
Insira a senha da criptografia BIP38.
You cannot add a private key to the address book.\n\nYou can import private keys in the Accounts tab

ALERT

Your device runs Android version 4.1.1 and has a critical bug known as Heartbleed.

This bug allows an attacker to read the memory of any apps on your device that make HTTPS connections.

 You should take immediate action!

1. Move your funds to new addresses where the private key has never been on an Android 4.1.1 device.

2. Upgrade your device to another version than 4.1.1 or use another device.
This feature requires your device to be able to tell its current location. It seems that your device cannot do that. Try enabling location services in your device settings.
You are using Local Trader for the first time and need to enter a few details.\n\nChoose the account you wish to use for your Local Trader identity:
Insira o seu apelido (nickname) de trader:
The name you chose is already taken. Please choose another name

This page shows your trade ads.

The list is currently empty.

Click the + button to create one.
This page shows your active trades.\n\nCompleted trades move to the Trade History tab.
Do you wish to buy or sell bitcoin:
Choose the location where you wish to trade:
Choose the premium you wish to add on top of the base price:
Choose the fiat currency you accept:
Choose the minimum amount to trade:
Choose the maximum amount to trade:
Desabilita a função de Trader Local
Tocar Som em Atividades de Trade
Tocar um som de notificação quando ocorrer atividade de trade
Usar milhas ao invés de quilômetros para distâncias
Sua carteira precisa de um upgrade para usar essa funcionalidade
Your currently selected account does not have enough funds.\nTo complete this deal you have to add more funds to your account.
Do you want to delete this sell order?
You can choose another base price
Enter your location or use the cross hair to get an approximation

This will detach your Local Trader account from Mycelium and delete locally cached trade data. The next time you use Local Trader you can attach the same address to continue using the same trader identity.\n\nDo you wish to detach from Local Trader?
Please solve this captcha.\nThis is to prevent spam.
Your device cannot integrate with Google Play Services, and may not get automatic notifications when trade updates occur.
One of your Local Trader ads will soon deactivate.

There is no Local Trader account associated with this wallet.

A trader account is linked directly to one of your bitcoin addresses, no passwords, no hassle.

Create one now?
Did you receive %1$s %2$s and are you ready to send the bitcoins to %3$s?
Do you wish to stop this trade?
Because both of you accepted the deal your ratings may get a penalty.\nDo you wish to abort this trade?
On a successful trade your funds will go to the following address:
The new price depends on the price formula set by the seller and the current market rates.\n\nIf you refresh the price you both have to accept the deal.

Local Trader is a communication platform for arranging in-person meetings to trade bitcoin and other currencies.\n\nNever accept to exchange money without meeting the other person first. They might try to scam you.
Enter your email address to get notifications when there are some activities on your Local-Trader account.
Unable to retrieve Trader Info from the server
We sent you a verification mail - click the provided link to activate your mail address.
You are using a private key with the following Bitcoin address:
Você escaneou um endereço Bitcoin. Você pode ver o seu saldo, mas não pode gastar dele.
Your Wallet is up to date with version %s
You cannot sign a message with an HD account
Please enter the message that you want to sign here
Error from geocoder: %s \n please try again later.
Set your email address to receive notifications from Local Trader
Send amount was updated from QR code
%1$s\n\n wants you to authenticate using the bitid protocol. Do you want to sign the request?
Warning: This website will receive the callback via http. For sensitive data, https should be used.
Authentication failed!\nAn error occurred while contacting the server. We are sorry!
Authentication failed, the nonce has expired.\nPlease refresh the website and scan again.
The connection timed out, please try again later.
Server could not be reached, please check your data connection.
Você abortou o processo de login.
Ocorreu o seguinte problema de SSL, você quer continuar?
Você não pode trabalhar com contas arquivadas.
Você agora está trabalhando nesse Conta HD.
Você agora está trabalhando nesse endereço único.
Verify master seed backup by scanning the QR code.
This page shows on which addresses the funds in the selected account are located. There are currently no funds to display.
Warning: Do not put your words into the clipboard, other apps could read them and obtain your money.
O backup foi verificado com sucesso.
The checksum of your word list is invalid, please make sure you entered all words correctly.
Only select this option if you understand what it means.\nA normal Mycelium backup never includes a password - this is not your PIN.
Please select the length of the word list to restore and indicate whether it is protected by a password.
Unable to get the current clipboard content
Não foi possível limpar a área de transferência
Não foi possível definir a string da área de transferência
Cannot import: master seed is already configured

THIS IS IMPORTANT

You are about to back up your master seed.

After making a backup you should set a PIN to prevent anyone that briefly holds your phone from making another backup and steal your current and future funds.

You will be shown a list of words, one after another. Write those words down using pen and paper, and store them in a safe place.
Toque no botão abaixo para iniciar
Please enter the words you just wrote down, one after another, to make sure that everything is backed up correctly.
You typed the wrong word, please try again

Your word list backup has successfully been verified. Store the backup in a safe place, your funds depend on it!

You have not configured a PIN!
Now is a good time to do so.

You can configure a PIN in the Settings menu.
Your word list backup has successfully been verified. Store the backup in a safe place, your funds depend on it!
YOU RPA SSW ORD ABC D
Você não pode arquivar uma conta HD não-utilizada

The world's best mobile wallet just got better.

Making a secure backup is now a breeze, and new HD accounts make you more anonymous than ever!

Check out the release notes for details.
The word you typed does not exist in the word list
Create a legacy backup, containing your single address accounts.
Cannot navigate to website, no browser found on phone

You do not have any account able to spend.\n\nIn order to spend, you need an account with a private key in it. There are currently no active HD accounts or single address accounts with private keys. Please either activate or import an account holding a private key in order to spend.
Você não pode esconder uma conta usada, mas você pode arquivá-la
Transactions are sent with a miner fee to get included within the next %1s block(s) on average.
Warning: Using the low-prio fee schedule is experimental and may result in transactions that never confirm. Use at your own risk.
Warning: Using the economic miner fee might take a very long time to confirm. Use at your own risk.
With the normal miner fee schedule you can expect your transactions to confirm within the next few blocks.
With the priority fee schedule you can expect your transaction to confirm within one or two blocks.
A mensagem do chat foi copiada para a área de transferência

Sorry, an additional backup is currently not possible.
Your PIN was recently changed.

To increase the security of your funds, we prevent you (or anyone else) to export the master-seed shortly after setting a new PIN.

 You have to wait for at least %1$d blocks (~ %2$s)

Sorry, an additional backup is currently not possible.
You haven't set a PIN

To increase the security of your funds, we prevent you (or anyone else) to export the master-seed without having set a PIN-Code.

Please go to Settings and configure a PIN.

WARNING - an additional backup is risky.

You already have exported your master seed before. If you have lost the old backup and you are not sure who might have access to it, it is very dangerous to continue to use this master seed.


Only keep using this master seed if you are sure all backups are safe!
If you forget your pin, you have the option to reset it after a waiting period of %s.
If you forget your pin, the only option is to recover from your backup.
For security reasons you will have to wait for about %1$s until the PIN is removed.\n\nDo you want to initiate the PIN reset procedure now?
A PIN reset is in progress. You still have to wait for %1$s until you can reset the PIN.\n\nDo you want to abort the pending PIN reset?
The share you have scanned has an invalid format.
The shares you have imported are not compatible.
Do you want to delete the information for this trade from your phone?
Do you want to delete your local trader identity? All trade information and ratings will be permanently removed and can not be recovered.
Warning:\n These keys won\'t be included in your Master-Seed-Backup. You have to ensure that you have a separate backup of them.
A new random private key has been generated with the following Bitcoin address:

This only works if your phone supports USB-OTG (on-the-go).\n\nTo connect the Trezor you need a USB-OTG-adapter or cable. Attach the Trezor with its own USB-Cable on the client-side and connect the host-side with your phone.
Verifique e confirme a \ntransação em sua Trezor
This option will import the next unused account from this trezor. It will only show up in MyTrezor if you send funds to it.
Um novo firmware da Trezor está disponível…
A new trezor firmware is available.\nPlease use MyTrezor.com on a PC to update your trezor.
Please connect or tap and hold your Ledger Wallet

Ledger Nano only works if your phone supports USB-OTG (on-the-go).\n\nTo connect Ledger Nano you need a USB-OTG-adapter or cable. Plug Ledger Nano on the client-side and connect the host-side with your phone.
Please connect or tap and hold your Ledger Wallet
This option will import the next unused account from this Ledger Wallet
Disconnect your Ledger Wallet, connect it in another application / computer to read the keyboard second factor, then connect it again to continue
Confirm output address using your Security Card
Disable Trusted Execution Environment support if present to use a different Ledger Hardware Wallet
Support a different AID for Ledger Unplugged custom builds
Warning: whoever knows this code knows all your transactions and balance for this account, but won\'t be able to spend bitcoin with it
Warning: whoever knows this code can spend all your current and future bitcoin from this account
You have entered a wrong pin.\n\n If you have forgotten your pin you can reset it.
Use the tor-network to communicate with the backend servers.\nThis improves your privacy and may route around restrictive Firewalls. But it may slowdown the performance of this app.
Info: All HD accounts are derived from your Master Seed - if you keep your 12-Words-Backup secure, you can restore all your HD accounts with it.
Warning: You have not a confirmed backup of your Master Seed. All your HD accounts are derived from it. They are only secure and recoverable, if you have a valid and safe Backup.
You must have Orbot installed and activated to proxy traffic through it. Would you like to install it from Google Play?
Orbot doesn\'t appear to be running. Would you like to start it up and connect to Tor?
Gastar a partir da semente mestre
This passphrase allows you to derive different accounts from the same master seed.\nIf you are not sure what this means, leave it empty.
To create a Coinapult Account you must agree to their Terms and Conditions
Do you want to provide your mail address?
Current account is watch-only - select different account.
Warning: You are about to share your private account data. Whoever gets hold of it can access all current and future funds in your account. Do you want to continue?
Do you really want to remove this queued transaction and prevent it from broadcasting?
Your balance will be corrected after the next synchronisation with the network

A Coinapult account allows you to store value in USD and spend instantly to any bitcoin address. While you use your private keys to access it, they are under control by Coinapult, unlike your funds on normal HD accounts.

You have paired your wallet with the external service Cashila.
This will add options to your main screen menu and your send dialog for directly invoking SEPA money transfers from within your bitcoin wallet.
Please understand that you have to trust Cashila, and that the money is no longer under your control as soon as you made a payment to Cashila.

Please visit www.cashila.com for more info.
Your Cashila account is not linked with your current Identity account - please pair your accounts
Are you sure you want to delete this payment?
It seems, you never used cashila before and have no existing recipients.\n\nTap OK to create a new recipient on their website.
Payment not sent - Payment request is already expired!

Unable to send payment to merchant-server.
%s

The payment will not be broadcasted.
The origin of this payment request can not be verified, because it has no signature.\n\nPlease be very cautious, as there might be someone intercepting it and changing payout addresses.

Your transaction uses funds which have not been included in a bitcoin block yet. If for any reason the transaction which sends these coins to you fails or stays unconfirmed, your transaction will fail or stay unconfirmed as well.
Place your phone back-to-back to another NFC-enabled device to share this payment request
Connection could not be established, maybe the server refused to connect.

WARNING: This will only delete the transaction from the local app. This function can not undo a transaction and can not prevent it from getting confirmed. It is only useful if the network has already forgotten the transaction because it did not confirm for a long time. In that case, you can delete it to access the funds again. You will need to synchronize after doing this. If the network still knows the transaction, it will show up again right after synchronizing.\\n\\nDo you want to delete the transaction from the local cache?

Re-submit this transaction to the server to broadcast it. This can be used if you suspect that the network has not propagated your transaction or dropped it, because it did not confirm for a long time for example. Do you want to re-broadcast this transaction?
Broadcast failed, please check your internet connection and synchronize your wallet.
Transaction details are looked up using the %1$s Block Explorer
Local Trader does not work with the selected account type, please select another account.
The selected account type does not work with local trader. You need to select another account to perform this trade.
If you provide your email address, you can file a support ticket with Coinapult by sending an email to support@coinapult.com from the email you specify.

Warning: Coinapult accounts cannot complete conversion transactions that are less than $1.00 USD of value. If less than 1 USD is sent to your Coinapult account, the conversion will fail. The bitcoins will be redeemable through Coinapult at support@coinapult.com.
Amount too low, minimum withdrawal is %1$s USD.
Setting the email address failed, please check for correct spelling and make sure your device has a working internet connection.

Your email address was set, you will receive an email with a confirmation link. Please copy that link and choose \'verify email\' from the account settings, to paste the link and verify the email address is correct.
Please paste the verification link from your coinapult email into the text field below.
Your coinapult email address was successfully verified.
An error occured verifying your email address. Please make sure you copy the complete and correct verification link.
You are about to export sensitive data of your local trader account. Anyone who gains access to these keys can take over your local trader account and act on your behalf. Do you want to continue?
No payment matching the criteria found. Please, manually select a transaction to prove.
No transactions matching the PoP request were found. You may select a non-matching transaction.
Check payment information to prove below
